rules: Rule1: If Regulation 2024 applies to Factory X, then Regulation 2024 requires safety protocols for Factory X.

Rule2: Under the condition that Regulation 2024 requires safety protocols for Factory X, if Factory X has a safety supervisor, then in the event that Factory X is using flammable solvents, Factory X is not operating at full capacity.
Rule3: If Factory X has a compliance certificate, then Factory X uses approved materials.
Rule4: Provided that Factory X has a compliance certificate, Factory X does not follow emission standards.
Rule5: Either Factory X has a compliance certificate, or it is not the case that Factory X is an approved facility.
Rule6: Under the condition that Factory X uses approved materials, Factory X follows emission standards.
Rule7: Factory X has a safety supervisor or Factory X has an automated safety system.
Rule8: Whenever Factory X has an automated safety system, if Factory X is using flammable solvents, then Factory X is not operating at full capacity.
Rule9: In the event that new legislation Regulation 2024 has been passed, Regulation 2024 applies to Factory X.
Rule10: If it is not the case that having a compliance certificate implies Factory X follows emission standards, then Factory X is operating at full capacity.
Rule11: Under the condition that it is not true that having a compliance certificate leads to Factory X following emission standards, Factory X is using flammable solvents.
Rule12: If a government inspection is not scheduled for Factory X, then Factory X is an approved facility.
facts: Fact1: New legislation named Regulation 2024 has been passed.

question: A government inspection is scheduled for Factory X.
